PageTitle: peer update-group-independent (BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view) (group)
FuncDef: The peer update-group-independent command sets each peer in a peer group as an independent update peer-group. The undo peer update-group-independent command disables each peer in a peer group from being set as an independent update peer-group. By default, no peer is set as an independent update peer-group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a BGP peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters and cannot contain spaces. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
